channel.title: ansible on 補覺鳴詩
channel.description: Recent content in ansible on 補覺鳴詩

item.title: ansible 紀錄
item.description: ansible 目錄結構 ansible.cfg # 參數 hosts # 要被執行的主機 ansible.cfg [defaults] inventory = hosts private_key_file=/path/to/file.pem hosts # yml 也可以 [webservers] 192.168.5.141 192.168.5.142 192.168.5.143 完成金鑰 copy 動作 測試 ansible all –list-hosts ansible all -m ping
